languages.text: "Нет... не думаю, Ваша Светлость". {n}Стальные глаза Клеменции обращаются вдаль, а челюсть заметно напрягается. Канцлер говорит учтиво, но сухо, явно смущенная вашей догадкой.{/n} "У нас разные взгляды на управление миром. Бывают дискуссии о принимаемых законах. Но мы оба работаем на благо протектората фон Валанциус, в этом нет сомнений".

traits.locale_text: "Нет... не думаю, Ваша Светлость". {n}Стальные глаза Клеменции обращаются вдаль, а челюсть заметно напрягается. Канцлер говорит учтиво, но сухо, явно смущенная вашей догадкой.{/n} "У нас разные взгляды на управление миром. Бывают дискуссии о принимаемых законах. Но мы оба работаем на благо торговой империи фон Валанциус, в этом нет сомнений".

languages.text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."
languages.original_text: "Нет... не думаю, Ваша Светлость". {n}Стальные глаза Клеменции обращаются вдаль, а челюсть заметно напрягается. Канцлер говорит учтиво, но сухо, явно смущенная вашей догадкой.{/n} "У нас разные взгляды на управление миром. Бывают дискуссии о принимаемых законах. Но мы оба работаем на благо протектората фон Валанциус, в этом нет сомнений".

traits.locale_text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite, but dry manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over laws that are being enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius trade empire, that much can be said without a doubt."

But we both work for the good of the von Valancius trade empire, that much can be said without a doubt."

She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."

languages.text: “没有……没有，我相信我并没有这种感觉，大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅严厉的双眼盯着远方，下巴明显紧张地向后缩着。她说话的语气彬彬有礼，但语速很快。很显然，你的洞察让她感到慌乱。{/n}“就如何管理世界这个问题上，我们有着不同的看法。有的时候，我们会对所制定的法律进行讨论，但我们都是为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的利益而效力，这一点毫无疑问。”
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."

traits.locale_text: “没有……没有，我相信我并没有这种感觉，大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅严厉的双眼盯着远方，下巴明显紧张地向后缩着。她说话的语气彬彬有礼，但语速很快。很显然，你的洞察让她感到慌乱。{/n}“就如何管理世界这个问题上，我们有着不同的看法。有的时候，我们会对所制定的法律进行讨论，但我们都是为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的利益而效力，这一点毫无疑问。”

languages.text: «No... no, no siento ninguna de las dos cosas, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}La férrea mirada de Clementia se pierde en la distancia y aprieta los dientes. Sus palabras son corteses pero entrecortadas, prueba de su sorpresa ante tu intuición.{/n} «Tenemos perspectivas diferentes sobre cómo gobernar un planeta y a veces discutimos sobre las leyes que se promulgan, pero los dos trabajamos por el bien del protectorado von Valancius, de eso no cabe duda».
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."

traits.locale_text: «No... no, no siento ninguna de las dos cosas, mi{mf|lord|lady}." {n}La férrea mirada de Clementia se pierde en la distancia y aprieta los dientes. Sus palabras son corteses pero entrecortadas, prueba de su sorpresa ante tu intuición.{/n} «Tenemos perspectivas diferentes sobre cómo gobernar un planeta y a veces discutimos sobre las leyes que se promulgan, pero los dos trabajamos por el bien del protectorado von Valancius, de eso no cabe duda».

languages.text: 「そんな…とんでもございません、陛下」{n}クレメンティアは険しい目で遠くを見つめる。歯を食いしばっているのがはっきりと見える。彼女は礼儀正しいがはっきりとした物言いで、こちらの洞察に明らかに慌てている。{/n}「私たちは惑星を統治する方法について異なる考えを持つことがしばしばあります。制定される法律をめぐって議論を交わすこともあります。ですが、共にフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領のために働いていると確信をもって言えます」
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."

traits.locale_text: 「そんな…とんでもございません、陛下」{n}クレメンティアは険しい目で遠くを見つめる。歯を食いしばっているのがはっきりと見える。彼女は礼儀正しいがはっきりとした物言いで、こちらの洞察に明らかに慌てている。{/n}「私たちは惑星を統治する方法について異なる考えを持つことがしばしばあります。制定される法律をめぐって議論を交わすこともあります。ですが、共にフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領のために働いていると確信をもって言えます」

languages.text: "Nein ... nein, ich empfinde beides nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementias stählerner Blick schweift in die Ferne, ihre Kiefer mahlen sichtbar. Sie spricht höflich, aber abgehackt, offensichtlich nervös wegen deines Scharfsinns.{/n} "Wir haben unterschiedliche Ansichten, wie man eine Welt führen sollte. Manchmal gibt es Diskussionen über erlassene Gesetze. Aber wir arbeiten beide für das Wohl des Protektorats von Valancius, das steht zweifelsfrei fest."
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."

traits.locale_text: "Nein ... nein, ich empfinde beides nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementias stählerner Blick schweift in die Ferne, ihre Kiefer mahlen sichtbar. Sie spricht höflich, aber abgehackt, offensichtlich nervös wegen deines Scharfsinns.{/n} "Wir haben unterschiedliche Ansichten, wie man eine Welt führen sollte. Manchmal gibt es Diskussionen über erlassene Gesetze. Aber wir arbeiten beide für das Wohl des Protektorats von Valancius, das steht zweifelsfrei fest."

languages.text: « Oh non... Non, le gouverneur ne m'inspire rien de tel, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Le regard perdu au loin, Clémentia serre la mâchoire avant de poursuivre sur un ton poli, mais vous voyez bien que votre remarque l'a troublée.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas le même point de vue sur la manière de diriger un monde. Par exemple, nous avons parfois des discussions passionnées sur les lois à promulguer. Cela étant, nous œuvrons tous deux pour le bien du protectorat von Valancius, je peux vous l'assurer. »
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."

traits.locale_text: « Oh non... Non, le gouverneur ne m'inspire rien de tel, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Le regard perdu au loin, Clémentia serre la mâchoire avant de poursuivre sur un ton poli, mais vous voyez bien que votre remarque l'a troublée.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas le même point de vue sur la manière de diriger un monde. Par exemple, nous avons parfois des discussions passionnées sur les lois à promulguer. Cela étant, nous œuvrons tous deux pour le bien du protectorat von Valancius, je peux vous l'assurer. »

languages.text: "Yok... Hayır, iki türlü de hissettiğimi sanmıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia; sert gözlerini uzaklara dikmiş, çenesini gözle görülür bir biçimde sıkıyor. Nazikçe ama kısa ve öz konuşuyor. Belli ki sezgilerin yüzünden eli ayağına dolaşmış.{/n} "Bir dünyanın nasıl idare edilmesi gerektiği konusunda görüş farklılığı yaşıyoruz. Bazen yürürlüğe giren yasaları tartıştığımız oluyor. Ancak ikimiz de von Valancius protektorasının yararı için çalışıyoruz, orası su götürmez."
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't believe I feel either, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia's steely eyes stare into the distance, her jaw clenching visibly. She speaks in a polite but clipped manner, clearly flustered by your insight.{/n} "We have different views on how to run a world. We sometimes have discussions over the laws that are enacted. But we both work for the good of the von Valancius protectorate, that much can be said without a doubt."

traits.locale_text: "Yok... Hayır, ikisini de hissettiğimi sanmıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, sert gözlerini uzaklara dikmiş ve çenesini gözle görülür bir biçimde sıkıyor. Nazik ama kısa ve öz bir biçimde konuşuyor. Belli ki sezgilerin yüzünden eli ayağına dolaşmış.{/n} "Bir dünyanın nasıl idare edilmesi gerektiği konusunda farklı görüşlerimiz var. Bazen düzenlenen yasaları tartıştığımız oluyor. Ancak ikimiz de von Valancius protektorasının yararı için çalışıyoruz; orası su götürmez."
